title: Demos
subtitle: See SlideJS in action with different rendering engines. Each example includes complete working code and source.

revealjs.title: reveal.js Demo
revealjs.description: Create HTML presentations using the reveal.js rendering engine. Learn how to use Slide DSL with reveal.js adapter.

swiper.title: Swiper Demo
swiper.description: Create modern touch slider presentations using Swiper.js rendering engine. Learn how to use Slide DSL with Swiper adapter.

splide.title: Splide Demo
splide.description: Create lightweight carousel presentations using Splide rendering engine. Learn how to use Slide DSL with Splide adapter.
